mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from message order by member_id asc,message_no asc)a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow} and member_id=#{member_id}
select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from message order by member_id asc,message_no desc)a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow} and message_receiver=#{member_id}
mapper.update: update message set message_yn='Y', message_rDate=sysdate where message_no=#{message_no} and message_yn='N'
mapper.delete: delete from message where message_no=#{message_no} and member_id=#{member_id}
